segments.advisor_message: Thank you for taking the time to discuss your dependents today. Can you please provide the full name of the dependent we’ll be adding to your profile?
segments.client_message: Sure, it’s Alex Johnson. I also want to mention that he was born on 15-03-2016.

segments.advisor_message: Got it. Thanks for that information. Now, is there a specific date until which Alex will be considered a dependent?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I believe it’ll be until 15-03-2034, which is when he turns 18.
